name: subirbia
description:
home is where the nest is. 

subirbia is a simple flight-centric 2D platformer game in which you are a bird living in an idyllic suburb of a major city and have to go about building a nest. to build this nest, you must gather sticks and bits of grass and mud from the ground and bring them back to your nest in the tree. 

controls:

space: hop / flap
a/d: left/right
left ctrl: peck and hold items
